lvl1.title: Reflection Power (Level 1)
lvl1.desc:
You reflect damage with
Reflection Power.
lvl1.bcard:
When you're defending, there is a
100% chance of 20% of the
damage being reflected at the
opponent.

lvl2.desc:

lvl1.title: Agility Power (Level 1)
lvl1.desc:
You are more agile and move
faster thanks to Agility Power.
lvl1.bcard:
Movement speed is increased by 1.
Reduces cooldown on skills by 5%.
All dodges are increased by 50.

lvl1.title: Frost Power (Level 1)
lvl1.desc:
Deals Frost Power damage to
opponents around you.
lvl1.bcard:
All opponents within 3 space(s)
are dealt 297(Player Level*3)
damage every second.
All opponents within 3 space(s)
are cursed with

minibuff.title: Gentle Cold Breeze
minibuff.desc: The Frost Power makes you freeze.
minibuff.bcard:

by 100.

15.
